mapper.select: SELECT b.b_title AS boardTitle, CONCAT("[", c.c_group1, "]", c.c_group2, " - ", c.c_group3) AS partyCateCode, p.p_url AS productUrl, b.b_body AS boardBody, p.p_amount AS partyAmount, p.p_amount_remain AS remainAmount, p.p_price AS partyPrice, p.p_price_remain AS remainPrice, b.b_period AS endDate, p.status_code AS status, CONCAT(l.location_do, " ", l.location_si, " ", l.location_gu, " ", l.location_dong, " ", l.location_detail) AS address, p.p_no AS partyNo FROM party AS p INNER JOIN board AS b ON p.b_no = b.b_no INNER JOIN location AS l ON b.b_no = l.b_no INNER JOIN category AS c ON c.c_code = p.c_code WHERE p_no = #{partyNo};
SELECT m.m_nick AS memberNick, pm.pm_amount AS memberAmount, m.m_email AS memberEmail FROM party_member AS pm INNER JOIN member AS m ON pm.m_no = m.m_no WHERE pm.p_no = #{partyNo};
SELECT p.p_no AS partyNo FROM party AS p JOIN board AS b ON p.b_no = b.b_no WHERE b.m_no = #{partyId}
